entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016
